creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominantly black with red, yellow, and white geometric embroidery; coat is open in front; sleeves are stitched together by a cloth embroidered strip decorated with blue and red tassels; inner lining of coat consists of red floral fabric; sleeve cuff and sides of coat have red fabric accents
title: Coat (chirpi)
